====Abstract====
!ConEmu is highly adaptable tool and have great number of settings.
When You displeased by default !ConEmu behaviour - go to the Settings and change them.

Most of settings may be changed via !ConEmu interface
(Settings dialog popped up by Win-Alt-P or SystemMenu).

Less number of settings may be changed manually via [Settings#Registry registry] or [Settings#ConEmu.xml !ConEmu.xml] file.

====Where settings are stores?====
!ConEmu may stores its settings in the Windows registry (HKCU), or in the !ConEmu.xml file.

====Registry====
All settings are stored in registry in the following key:

{{{[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\ConEmu\.Vanilla]}}}

When You specify the [Command_Line /config] switch in the !ConEmu.exe command line settings will be stored here:

{{{[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\ConEmu\«configname»]}}}

====!ConEmu.xml====
You may use !ConEmu in «portable» mode, so all settings will be stored in the _!ConEmu.xml_ file,
located next to the _ConEmuC.exe_. Template file _!ConEmu_Sample.xml_ is shipped with !ConEmu.
You must rename it to _!ConEmu.xml_ for engaging xml-mode. You may use [Command_Line /config]
switch with xml-mode too.

Note. You may rename this file any time, even after !ConEmu starts and loads its settings from registry.

====Manual change of settings====
So, You want to change setting, which is absent in the Settings dialog.
List and description of each setting You may find in the _Settings-ConEmu.reg_ file.
=====Using registry=====
Go to Registry editor (be careful!) and change appropriate value in the !ConEmu subkeys:
  * `[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\ConEmu\.Vanilla]`, when [Command_Line /config] switch is not using;
  * `[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\ConEmu\«configname»]`, when /config switch specified in the !ConEmu command line.
=====Using !ConEmu.xml=====
Open !ConEmu.xml file using any text editor (Far Manager, Notepad, and so on) find appropriate value and change it.
Usually, this file located net to the _ConEmuC.exe_.
